page.title: 03The Rev. W.J.Stewart
page.content: Mr. Stewart has been a vicar for ten years. He has been a clergyman for sixteen years. He holds services in the church every day. When sombody passes away, he has to visit the family. He also visits the sick. He teaches children at the school and has assemblies every fortnight. The area which Mr. Stewart covers is seventy square miles. There are four parishes. Lambourn parish is quite large. The other parishes are Eastbury, East Garston and Woodlands St. Mary. The smallest church that Mr. Stewart has preached in is Woodeaton Church, Oxford. Mr. Stewart has been to 30 funerals in 1985, but the average is about 20 every year. He has got 11 weddings booked so far in 1985.{
